conversations.description: Detect and remove a profanity-laden comment during a tech webinar, then post a reminder about chat etiquette.
Flag a hate‑speech message targeting a speaker, auto‑delete it, and send a private warning to the user.
Identify a repeated spam link, mute the offender for 10 minutes, and post a note about spam rules.
Notice a user asking an off‑topic question, politely redirect them to the Q&A session, and suggest a related poll.
Generate a live poll about preferred AI frameworks after seeing many mentions of TensorFlow and PyTorch in chat.
Summarize moderation actions halfway through a conference, highlighting removed messages and engagement spikes.
Detect a sudden surge of political debate, intervene with a neutral reminder to stay on the event topic.
Spot a user posting personal contact information, auto‑remove the message, and notify the host of a privacy breach.
Analyze chat sentiment after a keynote, post an encouraging message if sentiment drops, and suggest a break.
Create an ice‑breaker prompt about favorite industry trends when chat activity slows down.
Flag an abusive nickname, replace it with a generic placeholder, and warn the participant.
Detect non‑English messages in an English‑only event, translate a key question, and repost it in English.
Identify a user repeatedly posting the same question, merge duplicates, and post a concise FAQ answer.
Generate a discussion prompt about sustainability after multiple mentions of green tech in chat.
Summarize the top three discussion topics at the end of a panel, including participant counts.
Automatically mute a user who triggers profanity filter three times in a row, and inform the host.
Spot a phishing link disguised as a resource, delete it instantly, and broadcast a security alert.
Detect a participant praising the speaker repeatedly, post a thank‑you note to keep the vibe positive.
Create a rapid‑fire poll asking attendees which session they enjoyed most, based on recent chat votes.
Identify a user sharing copyrighted material, remove the post, and log the incident for later review.
Generate a prompt asking attendees to share their biggest challenge related to the workshop topic.
Flag a controversial meme, delete it, and replace it with a reminder about community standards.
Detect a sudden drop in chat activity, insert an engaging question to revive participation.
Summarize the number of messages moderated, the types of violations, and overall engagement metrics.
Identify a user posting an emergency alert (e.g., fire alarm), immediately notify the host and broadcast a safety message.
Post a celebratory message when a milestone of 500 live chat participants is reached.
Detect a repeated request for technical support, provide a short FAQ link, and tag the support channel.
Generate a prompt for a round‑table discussion on future industry trends after detecting buzzwords.
Flag a message containing hate symbols, remove it, and log the user for potential banning.
Identify a participant sharing personal health information, delete the message, and remind about privacy.
Create a quick poll asking if attendees want a deeper dive into a specific subtopic.
Detect a user posting repetitive emojis, warn them about spam, and suggest using reactions instead.
Summarize chat engagement for the last 30 minutes, highlighting peak activity periods.
Generate a discussion starter about recent market news after seeing related keywords in chat.
Flag a message using a racial slur, delete it, and automatically issue a temporary ban.
Spot a user asking for the event recording link, post the official URL in the chat.
Detect an off‑topic joke that could be offensive, replace it with a neutral comment.
Produce a post‑event report summarizing moderation actions, top topics, and participant satisfaction.
Identify a user posting a broken URL, provide a corrected link, and encourage proper sharing.
Generate a live quiz question about a statistic mentioned by the speaker, based on recent chat references.
Flag a suspicious bot message flooding the chat, mute the bot, and alert the host.
Detect a user requesting a discount code, respond with the official promotion policy.
Create a community‑building prompt asking attendees to share their hometowns.
Summarize the most frequently asked questions during the session and post a compiled answer.
Detect a participant using all caps excessively, remind them of tone guidelines.
Generate a poll asking whether to extend the Q&A by five minutes based on attendee interest.
Flag a message containing personal attacks, delete it, and send a private moderation notice.
Identify a user sharing a copyrighted video link, remove it, and suggest legal alternatives.
Post a motivational quote when chat sentiment dips below a threshold.
Summarize the diversity of topics discussed, highlighting under‑represented subjects.
Detect a user attempting to advertise a competing product, remove the promotion, and warn the user.
Generate an engaging prompt asking attendees to guess the next speaker's main theme.
